description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Supply And Logistics, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Unicef Capacity For Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes, including strategies to address cross cutting issues related to child rights, are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children set within CPD 2015-19.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes

description.narrative: A mapping exercise completed in 2016 indicated that UNICEF programmes are concentrated in 54% of the municipalities in BiH, with almost all of them being either highly or moderately deprived, indicating a strong focus on the most vulnerable. Effective programme management including of 4 UN Joint Programmes was assured | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/01/2017
